sim.author: Richard Harrison, Enrique Laso, Nikolai V. Chr., Joshua Davidson

help.title: McDonnel Douglas F-15 Eagle

key.desc: Toggle maneuvering nose wheel steering (15/45 deg)

key.name: u
key.desc: Cycle through the 3 refuelling probe switch positions

key.name: Ctrl-n
key.desc: Toggle Radar PULSE SRCH / TWS AUTO Mode

key.name: Ctrl-v
key.desc: Back to Pilot's View or toggle Pilot's and Backseat View.

help.line: JFS start: select JFS switch on engine panel; pull JFS lever and JFS will start providing there is enough pressure. 3 start attempts are possible.
Engine start: Either start JFS or external air. Ensure both engines shutoff on engines panel. Start L engine then R engine.
Take off: MILthrust, rotate at 130-160Kts depending on configuration. Do not exceed 10 degrees of pitch
Windshield heat required when at high altitudes or low temperatures to prevent frosting
Use MPCD to view selected armament, select ARMT, PACS
Shows all targets within radar range.
Cabin pressure maintained according to schedule. Oxygen delivery simulated
CAS: Pitch, Roll, Yaw damping controlled by CAS switches above throttles

model-content.text: 80-0007 Block 27 Wind tunnel aerodynamics ref: AFIT/GAE/ENY/90D-16

key.name: Ctrl-n
key.desc: Toggle Radar PULSE SRCH / TWS AUTO Modes

key.name: Ctrl-v
key.desc: Select pilot's view (view 0) or toggle between pilot's and RIO's view

key.name: u
key.desc: Cycle through the 3 refuelling probe switch positions
